snippet.title: Decision 3 Flash Game Trailer
snippet.description:
The new Decision: Red Daze available now on Steam : https://bit.ly/yt_DecisionRedDaze and GOG.com : https://bit.ly/ytg-DecisionRedDaze
Stay tuned https://twitter.com/DecisionRedDaze

"Decision 3" is a flash game that was released in 2014. Fight, conquer, reinforce and protect your growing group of survivors! And now we are making a new "Decision" game for Steam! 

FlyAnvil team would love your support! https://boosty.to/flyanvil
